mapper.select: SELECT a.ARTICLE_NUM, a.ARTICLE_TOPCATE, a.ARTICLE_BOTCATE, a.ARTICLE_TAGNAME, a.ARTICLE_TITLE, a.ARTICLE_TEXT, a.ARTICLE_DATE, a.ARTICLE_MODIFY_DATE, a.ARTICLE_VIEW, a.ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM, u.USER_NICK FROM TBL_ARTICLE a JOIN TBL_USER u ON a.USER_NUM = u.USER_NUM WHERE a.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = #{category} AND ( -- 7일 이내 게시글이 있는 경우 (a.ARTICLE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 AND a.ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM = ( SELECT MAX(ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM) FROM TBL_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_BOTCATE = #{category} AND ARTICLE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7) ) OR -- 7일 이내 게시글이 없을 때 최신글 출력 (NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_BOTCATE = #{category} AND ARTICLE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 ) AND a.ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM = ( SELECT MAX(ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM) FROM TBL_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_BOTCATE = #{category} )) ) ORDER BY a.ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM DESC, a.ARTICLE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT USER_NUM, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICK, USER_PW, USER_PHONE, USER_MAIL, USER_MENTO_CERT, USER_MONITOR, USER_AGREE, USER_CAREER FROM TBL_USER ORDER BY USER_MONITOR DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_TEXT, NOTICE_VIEW, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOTICE_DATE, -- 날짜만 출력 NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_TEXT, NOTICE_VIEW, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NOTICE_TITLE ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_TEXT, NOTICE_VIEW, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NOTICE_TITLE ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 ) ) WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.ARTICLE_NUM, a.ARTICLE_TOPCATE, a.ARTICLE_BOTCATE, a.ARTICLE_TAGNAME, a.ARTICLE_TITLE, a.ARTICLE_TEXT, a.ARTICLE_DATE, a.ARTICLE_MODIFY_DATE, u.USER_NICK, -- 추가한 category 필드 a.ARTICLE_TOPCATE || ' > ' || a.ARTICLE_BOTCATE AS category, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.ARTICLE_DATE DESC) AS rn FROM TBL_ARTICLE a JOIN TBL_USER u ON a.USER_NUM = u.USER_NUM WHERE a.ARTICLE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR a.ARTICLE_TEXT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR ARTICLE_TEXT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE tag = #{tag} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE tag = #{tag}
